Question: This person was born in Kosciusko, Mississippi, to an unmarried teenage mother.
Hints: Late in 1996, this person introduced the Oprah's Book Club segment to her television show.
The film went on to become a Broadway musical which opened in late 2005, with this person credited as a producer.
This person held a fundraiser for Obama on September 8, 2007, at her Santa Barbara estate.
